pr_title: [BEAM-9027] Unparse DOY/DOW/WEEK Enums properly for ZetaSQL

timeline.message: [BEAM-9027] Unparse DOY/DOW/WEEK Enums properly for ZetaSQL
[BEAM-9027] Unparse DOY/DOW/WEEK Enums properly for ZetaSQL

timeline.bodyText: How could this test pass without running BeamZetaSqlCalcRel? My understanding is that the changes in this PR is only used in BeamZetaSqlCalcRel. Is this not correct?
timeline.author: robinyqiu

replies.bodyText: BigQuery predicate push-down also makes use of the unparsing.
replies.author: 11moon11

replies.bodyText: I think it could pass because ZetaSQL somehow starts to support EnumType.
replies.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: Limited support for EnumType was added but the tests weren't turned on.
replies.author: apilloud
